overview: Revolving around an intramural, fraternity basketball team, this ensemble Rom-Ind-Com begins with the semi-final of the championship and ends with the final, but has little to do with basketball. When the APEs find out that their rival frat, the DIKs have discovered their big secret with only two days to go, the only remedy...their star player must go to Mexico with a co-ed, marry her, and make it back in time. As the team starts to unravel, will they make it to game, or will they even care to, by the end?
title: Bounce Past
